title.narrative: PROGRAMME COORDINATION

description.narrative: The knowledge of relevant stakeholders on child rights and UNICEF's mission in Iran particularly its focus on most vulnerable boys and girls is enhanced, which contributes to Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Monitoring, Data And Situation Analyses, Gender Discriminatory Roles And Practices, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas, Policy, Guidance And Technical Support For Country Programming And Reporting, Supply And Logistics, Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes, Unicef Capacity For Programming On Gender, Unicef Capacity For Supply And Logistics. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Programme Planning, Coordination and Management

participating-org.narrative: MINISTRY OF HEALTH AND MEDICAL EDUCATION
VEZARAT DADGOSTARI NATIONAL BODY ON CONVENTION CHILDRE

Technical assistance - Cross-sectoral communication for development

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: The knowledge of relevant stakeholders on child rights and UNICEF's mission in Iran particularly its focus on most vulnerable boysand girls is enhanced

description.narrative: The CO finalized the new CPD in close consultation with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, developed a resource mobilization strategy and a C4D strategy for the new cycle, and contributed to UN coordination around UNDAF and emergency preparedness. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2016

title.narrative: CPD ORR ceiling funding gaps
% of 2012-2014 work plans signed
Programme oversight: percentage of planned results in the current CPAP matrix are achieved.
Number of C4D events and bulletins shared with staff annually
Number of Steering Committee and coordination meetings held with CP partners annually

Percentage of planned studies, surveys and evaluations completed (IMEP)
Results Based Management and Reporting: Regular consultation held with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs on UNICEF's work in Iran.

actual.value: 2016:•At least monthly consultations with MFA have been held

title.narrative: Governance and Accountability: Inter-UN Action Map produced on all UN Adolescent and Youth initiatives 2017-2018 and endorsed by UNCT.

actual.value: 2016:•Mapping of different UN agency adolescent and youth initiatives almost complete. To be presented in August UNCT .

title.narrative: Results Based Management and Reporting: An equity-focused, evidence-based CPAP approved.

actual.value: 2016:•Programme Strategy Notes drafted for all sections. CPAP drafting to commence in August 2016.

title.narrative: Natural Disasters and Epidemics: Cluster TORs and Contingency Plans are updated/agreed upon by cluster members.

actual.value: 2016:UNICEF provided inputs to the new UN ERP plan, including updated contingency plans for the sectors UNICEF leads.

title.narrative: CPAP finalised
Emergency preparedness: EWEA updated twice a year
Gender equality mainstreamed and updated annually through the office gender work plan
UN Contingency Plan updated with UNICEF inputs once a year
